title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5117.3 - Alcoholic beverages
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5117.3 - Alcoholic beverages

State Regulations

Nothing in these regulations prohibits the service of
alcoholic beverages at a video lottery gaming facility pursuant to a license
issued by the State Liquor Authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5117.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
